direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods are used to cancel orders, though cancelOcoOrder specifically targets OCO orders.
Both methods involve order management and handle similar parameters like 'symbol' and 'isIsolated'.
getOcoOrder retrieves OCO order details, which can be used to verify the state before and after cancelOcoOrder.
Both methods interact with the open orders of a margin account, though getOpenOrders retrieves all open orders.
account retrieves the margin account details, which can be used to verify state changes after order cancellation.

enhanced_by.reason: Initializing the margin account state can help set up the environment for order cancellation tests.
Placing an OCO order before cancellation is necessary to have an order to cancel.
Verifying the state of the OCO order post-cancellation can ensure the cancellation was successful.
Checking the open orders list can confirm that the OCO order was removed.
